title: Beef fillet medallions, wild mushroom brandy cream, green bean fricassée and champ
description: Who can resist beef fillet served with a creamy mushroom and brandy sauce, crunchy green beans and a mound of Irish champ to mop up the juices?
ingredients: 180g/6oz mixed chestnut and wild mushrooms, sliced
600g/1lb 5 oz beef fillet, cut into medallions
salt and freshly ground black pepper
